text: Juan Joya Borja (5 April 1956 – 28 April 2021) was a Spanish comedian and actor known by the stage name El Risitas. He became well known in 2015 because of many memes based on a television interview he did from June 2007 on Jesús Quintero's show . He also appeared in the 2005 movie Torrente 3: El protector. Joya died on 28 April 2021 at a hospital in Seville, Spain from a heart attack, aged 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Internet celebrities Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Spanish comedians Category:People from Seville
title: El Risitas
